titleStmt.title: A relation sent from Rome, of the processe, sentence, and execution, done vpon the body, picture, and bookes, of Marcus Antonius de Dominis, Archbishop of Spalato, after his death Published by command.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by [George Eld and Miles Flesher? for] John Bill, printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The proceedings at Rome against the Archb. of Spalato.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
